channel.title: Mopargregate
channel.description: Well the name could do with work i suppose but thats ok. Well firstly has anyone heard of Kongregate? if not go to their website and see what its about before reading this thread otherwise it will probably be lost on you. I think it would be pretty cool if there was mopar website like kongregate where people post their games with badges and stuff so that its a games website made by the people of MITB for the people of MITB if everyone contributes it would soon fill up with games and people would be able to earn badges like in Kongregate. What do you think?

item.title: Mopargregate
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:6, topic:204213”]True but some people like to do projects and things like that it would be interesting[/quote]Projects related to hacking the rs client, not making games.

item.title: Mopargregate
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Well I didnt mean an exact replica perhaps have our own unique twist on it we certainly have the brainpower on this forums so why not use it effectively?

item.title: Mopargregate
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

And what would set us apart from Kongregate? If we’re just blindly copying random websites, why not copy something that is actually successful, like Google?

item.title: Mopargregate
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

sanga282:

I think it would be pretty cool if there was mopar website like kongregate where people post their games with badges and stuff so that its a games website made by the people of MITB

The only problem is that everyone at this site is either too lazy or too dumb to pull something like this off, with the exception of a handful of users.
